outputs.output_descr:
The Municipal Alliance for Peace (MAP) was established in June 2005, following increasingly louder calls from both Palestinian and Israeli citizens for proactive steps to be taken towards a just and lasting peace in the region.  MAP through joints initiatives of the Association of Palestinian Local Authorities (APLA) and the Union of Local Authorities in Israel (ULAI), with support from international municipal authorities, seeks to instigate joint Palestinian and Israeli projects at the Municipal level to tackle urgent problems within corresponding Israeli and Palestinian municipalities, as well as promoting peace and encouraging greater dialogue between the two sides.

The project goal is to contribute to the peace initiative in the LG through providing the logistical support for MAP secretarial, through contributing to the capacity building of the Secretariat staff.

project_title: support to peace initiatives in local governance-map
